name: BoneJour
description:
BIG WARNING NOTE

WebGl version is scuffed and even login sometimes breaks.
For nicer experience try the Windows version.
Your character is saved when you disconnect. Please leave the game and re-connect every 30 minutes to avoid tears.😿😿😿

If you want to play but server had exploded contact me on discord:
https://discord.gg/d5qCq7YRGt

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/BlueKiwiEntert1

HOW TO PLAY?

Move character with mouse right click.

Press [i] to open inventory.

Press left click to attack.

Press hotbar hotkeys to use abilities.

Press X symbol on ability to destroy it.

Drag and drop abilities to swap them places, put them in inventory.
(Dragging and destroying is disabled when any ability is on cooldown)

Slay enemies to obtain spell points (white, purple and red) which can be used to craft magical abilities of varying power.

WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?

BoneJour is a game created for Multplayer Game Jam by Photon and Global Game Jam. I had an itch to create a MMOBA framework and decided to try hacking something together with photon fusion.

Your goal is to obtain spells by mixing points. There should be a short gameplay video on the right. There are many powerful spells that can be unlocked with correct combination of points.

THEME IS RECONNECT

This is tackled in two ways:
1. Your character is saved in the database and you can reconnect to continue playing at anytime.
2. There are many ways to connect the spell points together to obtain desired result.

HELP I AM STUCK

Press the respawn button.
